The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Thursday

Zucchini Soup with Cashew Cream– vegan /gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (zucchuini, white onion, carrot, celery, red bell pepper, tomato, cashew, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Japanese Black Rice – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (black rice, lentils, miso, sunflower seeds, sesame, leek, red bell pepper)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Onion & Olive Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 50 g (white onion, millet, black olive, hemp seed, flaxseed, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Chocolate Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (cashew, almonds, dates, fresh cocoa powder, alkaline cocoa, unfiltered honey)
